summary: Code is filtering and categorizing data, using the "know thyself, know thy enemies" rule, repeating until complete.

details.comment: Code is filtering and categorizing data, using the "know thyself, know thy enemies" rule, repeating until complete.
details.content:
FIRST: FIND THE CORRESPONDING SMALLEST CATEGORY AND FILTER OUT THINGS
[[[ RULE OF THUMB: KNOW THYSELF, KNOW THY ENEMIES ]]]
NEXT: REPEAT THE PROCESS UNTIL NOTHING LEFT.
